Header.title: Brainwave
Header.paragraph: Taking Meeting notes has never been easier. Power up your productivity by not missing any details from your meetings.

About.paragraph: CS210, also referred to as Software Projects with Corporate Partners, is a senior project course at Stanford University. Our group, consisting of CS majors with diverse skill sets, was assigned to collaborate with BMW. Our objective was to develop an innovative application that would enhance productivity within vehicles. With a strong ambition to create a marketable product, we sought to leverage the most advanced AI models available. After two quarters of dedicated work and an insightful visit to BMW headquarters in Munich, we proudly present our final creation.
